About Armaf

Established in 2015, Armaf has quickly risen to prominence in the fragrance industry by creating high-quality perfumes at accessible price points. The brand has gained international recognition for its ability to craft sophisticated scents that rival premium designer fragrances. Tres Nuit represents one of their most successful offerings, beloved by fragrance enthusiasts worldwide.

Frequently Asked Question

Is Armaf Tres Nuit similar to Creed Green Irish Tweed?

Yes, Armaf Tres Nuit is widely considered one of the most successful interpretations of Creed's Green Irish Tweed, offering a similar green fougÃ¨re character with fresh lemon and verbena top notes, a floral heart, and a woody-musky base. While maintaining its own identity, it delivers a comparable sophisticated experience at a fraction of the price, making it popular among fragrance connoisseurs seeking value without compromising quality.

Discover the elegant sophistication of Armaf Tres Nuit EDT 100ML today and add this new arrival to your fragrance collection. Perfect for the discerning gentleman who appreciates refined scents with classic appeal. âœ¨
